Game.Name: Moero!! Jaleco Collection (Japan)
Game.plot: Games included in this compilation: Moero!! Pro YakyuuMoero 2!! Pro TennisMoero 3!! Pro Yakyuu '88 - Kettei BanMoero 4!! Junior BasketMoero 5!! Pro SoccerMoero 7!! Judo WarriorsCheat: Please enter the following passwords:Cheat: Start a Left-Handed pitcher. Move the pitcher to the left side of the mound, and hold Down on every pitch, and the computer won't swing. Around the 5th inning, when the pitcher starts to become tired, replace him with another lefty and continue.Cheat: To not get ejected during a fight, continually press the B button the entire time the fight is going on.Cheat: After the 3rd inning, bean the 3rd or 4th hitter in the lineup, and he will charge the mound and be ejected from the game.Cheat: Enter the password below to achieve the following record for Team LACheat: Enter these passwords to start with 50 wins and no losses in the 130-game schedule:Cheat: Algeria- CTXAREZCGPLOPEOB Argentina- JTXAREZCGXIKLUEL Belgium- ATXAREZCGRHFOEOB Brazil- ITXAREZCGPIGKCMB Denmark- ITXAREZCGVIGKWIL England- JTXAREZCGZLGKUGJ France- ETXAREZCGAISKWHJ Holland- QTXAREZCGWLUOUGJ Italy- DTXAREZCGAHKLUIL Japan- PTXAREZCGXMKLWIJ Poland- ATXAREZCGUMJPCTD Spain- DTXAREZCGOHFOCOB Uruguay- ITXAREZCGULGKESB USA- HTXAREZCGWHKLWEJ USSR- ZTXAREZCGOHGOERB West Germany- LTXAREZCGTMGOCRDCheat: Enter these passwords to play as the listed player in the Championship roundCheat: Enter these passwords to play as the listed player in the Championship roundCheat: Enter these passwords to play as the listed player in the Championship round
